title: Bloom 1.0.467 – Lightweight, cross-platform, procedural graphics editor
content: Bloom (was Ormr) is a fast, lightweight, cross-platform procedural graphics editor that lets you tweak any action you have ever performed — organized by layer. title: OneWaySync 3.1 – Create mirrors of folders
